name: stats_cdf_beta
purpose: CDF function for BETA Distribution. Calculates any one parameter of the beta distribution given values for the others.

return.description:
STATUS  -- 0 if calculation completed correctly
               -I if input parameter number I is out of range
                1 if answer appears to be lower than lowest
                  search bound
                2 if answer appears to be higher than greatest
                  search bound
                3 if P + Q .ne. 1
                4 if X + Y .ne. 1
